001package org.nasdanika.exec.gen.content;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.net.MalformedURLException;
006import java.net.URL;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.stream.Collectors;
009
010import org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl;
011import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
012import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
013import org.nasdanika.common.BasicDiagnostic;
014import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
015import org.nasdanika.common.Diagnostic;
016import org.nasdanika.common.ExecutionException;
017import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
018import org.nasdanika.common.Status;
019import org.nasdanika.common.Supplier;
020import org.nasdanika.common.SupplierFactory;
021import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
022import org.nasdanika.emf.EObjectAdaptable;
023import org.nasdanika.exec.content.Resource;
024import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marked;
025import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marker;
026
027public class ResourceSupplierFactoryAdapter extends AdapterImpl implements SupplierFactory<InputStream> {
028
029        private List<? extends Marker> markers;
030        
031        public ResourceSupplierFactoryAdapter(Resource resource) {
032                setTarget(resource);
033                Marked marked = EObjectAdaptable.adaptTo((EObject) getTarget(), Marked.class);
034                markers = marked == null ? null : marked.getMarkers();
035        }
036        
037        @Override
038        public boolean isAdapterForType(Object type) {
039                return type == SupplierFactory.class;
040        }
041
042        @Override
043        public Supplier<InputStream> create(Context context) {
044                ClassLoader[] classLoaders = { getClass().getClassLoader(), Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), context.get(ClassLoader.class) };           
045                
046                return new Supplier<InputStream>() {
047                        
048                        private URL theURL;
049                        
050                        @Override
051                        public Diagnostic diagnose(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
052                                try {
053                                        Resource resource = (Resource) getTarget();
054                                        URI uri = URI.createURI(resource.isInterpolate() ? context.interpolateToString(resource.getLocation()) : resource.getLocation());
055                                        org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource eResource = resource.eResource();
056                                        if (eResource != null) {
057                                                URI base = eResource.getURI();
058                                                if (base != null) {
059                                                        uri = uri.resolve(base);
060                                                }
061                                        }
062                                        
063                                        String iUrl = uri.toString();                                   
064                                        
065                                        if (iUrl.startsWith(Util.CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX)) {
066                                                String resourcePath = iUrl.substring(Util.CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX.length());
067                                                for (ClassLoader classLoader: classLoaders) {
068                                                        if (classLoader != null) {
069                                                                theURL = classLoader.getResource(resourcePath);
070                                                                if (theURL != null) {
071                                                                        break;
072                                                                }
073                                                        }
074                                                }                                               
075                                                
076                                                if (theURL == null) {
077                                                        return new BasicDiagnostic(Status.ERROR, "Classpath resource not found: " + iUrl, markers);                                             
078                                                }
079                                        } else {
080                                                theURL = new URL(iUrl);
081                                        }
082                                        return Supplier.super.diagnose(progressMonitor);
083                                } catch (MalformedURLException e) {                                     
084                                        return new BasicDiagnostic(Status.ERROR, e.getMessage() + (markers == null ? "" : " at " + markers.stream().map(Object::toString).collect(Collectors.joining(", "))));
085                                }
086                        }
087
088                        @Override
089                        public double size() {
090                                return 1;
091                        }
092
093                        @Override
094                        public String name() {
095                                return "Resource: " + markers == null ? "(undefined)" : markers.stream().map(Object::toString).collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
096                        }
097
098                        @Override
099                        public InputStream execute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
100                                try {
101                                        Resource resource = (Resource) getTarget();             
102                                        if (resource.isInterpolate()) {
103                                                return Util.filter(context, theURL.openStream(), context::interpolateToString);
104                                        }
105                                        return theURL.openStream();
106                                } catch (IOException e) {
107                                        throw new ExecutionException(e, this);
108                                }
109                        }
110                        
111                };
112        }
113
114}
